msbt.message: I heard you were really going for it yesterday, . That's what I like to hear! Sometimes when I'm deeply focused on , a whole day can feel like a minute. Just make sure you set aside time for meditation and a nice cup of every so often.
I heard that you made some waves in the fishing scene yesterday.We should get a collab together sometime. You catch the fish, and I pose with them!
A little bug told me that you were catching ALL his buddies yesterday.Wait, what are you doing with all of those bugs, anyway?Please tell me you're not letting them loose in my backyard!

I saw what you did yesterday, you know.Ha HA! I had you going there for a second, didn't I? It's nothing bad. I just saw you collecting shells. So, you making a necklace, or a bracelet, or What else are shells good for, exactly?

They tell me that you scored a whole bunch of clams yesterdayMe, I don't really have the patience for digging up clams.If the clams are willing to dig themselves up and leap into my pockets, then I guess I'll take 'em.
I heard it was raining balloons yesterday, !You must be a real deadeye with that slingshot, huh?Ha HA! Did I sound like an authentic cow-? I'm up for a part in a western, so I've been practicing.

Your wish has been granted.Ha HA! You were wishing on a whole bunch of shooting stars last night, weren't you? I know because I happened to be in a tree nearby for totally normal reasons. I've got an audition for Tree #6 in a major production. Fingers crossed!
Hey! What gives, shaking all of the trees already?You gotta leave something for the rest of us. <10_4 />Get it? Leave?! Ha HA! Alright, now make like a tree, and drop a wasp nest on my face.
Were you going to invite me to the soft open of your new dance club or what? I know you were chopping all kinds of wood the other day, so I can only assume that's what you're building.

It's looking a littlesparsearound here lately, wouldn't you say?You cut down so many trees! Don't get me wrongâ€”I like the new sight lines!Just be sure to plant some new ones somewhere, will you? I've gotta have my local
Hey, are you the one who planted all of the greenery the other day?<10_4 /> Stunning work! Having a green thumb is always in style.

A little told me that you've been watering the plants around here lately. I can just see it now Tipping the watering can back in slow motion, the droplets sparkling in the sun Next time give me just a tiny bit of advance warning and I'll book a cinematographer.

My agent tells me that you might be auditioning for something, . Is that true? Well, why else would you be having all of those wonderfully expressive reactions to things? Alright, alright. If you do hear of any choice parts for an expressive , I trust you'll let me know.
You've been putting in a lot of DIY lately, haven't you?, I wish I could make things like you do. I mean OTHER than world-class !

You've really been putting your tools to the test, or so I've heardWell, I always sayif broken tools were only for fools, then the whole world is an oyster. That's loosely translated from Italian, but I think you get the gist.
Hey, I feel like I haven't seen you around much lately Have you been hanging out at your place? Yeah, I have chill days like that. Like laundry day. Nap day. Listen to in the bathtub day
, I feel like you're everywhere on lately! Brand awareness, baby. Well, just make sure you're staying safe in the sun. UV isn't just two consecutive letters in the alphabet!

I saw what you did the other day putting in all those pitfalls. Very sneaky, !Ah, but if you want to catch me, you're going to have to try harder than that! Oh, you weren't trying to catch me, were you?

Hey, is everything alright? How are youruhbones and stuff doing?I just heard that you kept falling into pits yesterday, and I was worried about you. Those things are no joke. I fell into one once and I couldn't dance to for a week!
What kind of secret project were you working on over at your place yesterday, anyway? Doing a little interior decorating? You know you can always call me for advice, right?
What's up with you and your phone lately, ? It's like you're always on it! Oh. Oh, .<10_4 /> I just sounded exactly like my dad.

Oh, Remember yesterday? The laughter? The crying? The ? OK, maybe we didn't share everything, but it was quite a day for us, wasn't it? I feel like we really connected on a deeper level. Like, we could finish each other's unfinished novels. Ha HA!

Hey, I heard that you and were, like, joined at the hip the other day! I'm not gonna lie and say I'm not a little jealous.Just tell me you guys didn't record a new album together. That's supposed to be OUR thing.
I hear you've been quite the social butterfly lately, .Hey, this could be a good chance for some brand synergyWould you mind name-dropping my latest one- show every so often?
Hey, are you doing alright? I heard your face lost a fight with a bunch of wasps the other day. Your face is like your business card for your brand, so you've gotta protect it, .

How's the face treating you today, ? I heard about your wasp sting I played Wasp-Sting Victim #3 in Vampire, so I know a thing or two about treating stings. Yes, Vampire is a real movie. Even though I filmed it in my basement. ESPECIALLY because I filmed it in my basement!
I heard through the vine that you've been excavating a ton of fossils lately, . I always wonder what kind of designer clothes those ancient creatures liked to wear
So, did you find anything? I sawâ€”and heardâ€”you banging on all kinds of rocks yesterday. I'll drop my designer if you hit me with a shovel, and I won't be happy about it.
So, um I don't know if you were trying to be discreet about this, but I saw where you buried the Bells. Don't worry. My lips are sealed. Butyou do realize that we have a bank on , right?
I heard you were in full-on harvest mode the other day, Farmer . Hey, you should take that as a compliment.If it weren't for farmers, I couldn't make my legendary farm-to-table , !

Were you waiting for a callback the other day, or what?Oh, that's a relief. I hate waiting around all day just to have my agent inform me that I didn't get the part. What do you mean "is my agent just me with a fake mustache"?!
It seems like you had your head buried in your phone every time I saw you yesterday, . Now, I'm not one to judge But what could have possibly been so interesting on there?!
, it's so luxurious being able to walk all over the place on these new paths! I mean, sure, we could have walked on the grass before, butnow we're walking in style!
Were you the one who's been working on our river and irrigation systems so much lately? , that's so cool! Any chance you could terraform a hot tub in my yard? Ha HA!
It must have been a lot of work building all of those scenic cliffs the other day, huh? But let me tell you This definitely appreciates the view.
You know what they say about fences. They make great neighbors!Huh, that's doesn't make sense. Is it the other way around? Good neighbors make great fences? Yeah, that's it.
I heard you spent a bunch of time rearranging things all around the other day. Let me know if you need any tips. I could make this place look like a trendy club in no time.
I hear you've been racking up Nook Miles like crazy!I hope you get something really cool and exclusive when you trade 'em in, .
Bravo, !That's Norwegian for "good job paying off that loan."Now you can get me that I've been wanting for my birthday. Ha HA!
A little raccoon told me that you've been doing some serious shopping lately, . No judgment from me! Shopping is a sport, not unlike .You've got to practice if you want to win. Ha HA!
You listen to the island tune much? It's got this whole- vibe going that I love. Wait, you COMPOSED that?! Oh, ! Will you score my next documentary?

Hey, I heard that you were the one who designed the flag they've got flying at Resident Services Nicely done!<10_4 /> Waitdoes that mean you could mock up a design for me?I'm looking for something in the vest family of garments, in either your softest or scratchiest material.
I saw you transforming your style a whole bunch the other day using your wand That thing is SO cool. You can go from rocker to superstar in a blink!
You know, I see you vaulting across the water all the time, and I'm kinda jealous, . I used to be kind of a big deal in . Why can't I vault all over the place like you?!
Word on the street is you've been investing heavily in the stalk market, . Let me know if you need any market tips. I know a guy.<10_4 /> OK, it's me.
So I heard you came into a bunch of Bells recently You're becoming a stalk market power broker! Let me know if you're interested in becoming an angel investor in my boutique company

Everyone is talking about how much you were talking yesterday!No, no I didn't mean it that way. Not like we were gossiping about you or anything. Alright, fine. It was just me, talking to myself in the mirror. Are you happy, ?!
Hey, I heard you've really been cleaning up lately with your weeding! Any chance you want to spend some of that energy organizing my closet?
Love the new haircut, .I wonder how it would look on meNah, I'm gonna go ahead and respect your boundaries by not copying your haircut. For two weeks.
Whoa!<10_4 /> Isis that you, ?I hardly recognize you! You're really reinventing yourself., I wish I had that kind of facial range. I'd definitely get cast more often

You still got that camera ready, ? Here we go!Pose!<10_4 /> Pose!<10_4 /> Pose!<10_4 /> Annnndpose!Whew. That was a lot of work. I guess that's why they say being a model is the hardest job in the world.
